changes.release_note: The field `description` was removed from the `Product` type. This is a breaking change and any queries that relied on `description` will no longer work.
The field `description` was renamed to `details` in the `Product` type. This is a breaking change and any queries using `description` need to be updated to use `details`.
The field `stock` was removed from the `Product` type. This is a breaking change and any queries that relied on `stock` will no longer work.

release_notes.summary: This release introduces breaking changes: the removal of the `description` and `stock` fields from the `Product` type, and the renaming of `description` to `details`. Update your queries accordingly.
